live_updates: This issue has been resolved, Thank you for your patience.
Our teams are looking into it. We estimate your service will be restored by 11:00am, Please stay tuned for updates.
36815.summary: Some customers in Mission are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
36815.title: Apr 25 – Mission | All Services - Outage (Resolved)
